ygData.msgSnippet: His purple and complex shell laid on the floor of the engine room. Finish now after a day or so of constant work without sleep. Aracnia was weak, her joints

    His purple and complex shell laid on the floor of the engine room. Finish 
now after a day or so of constant work without sleep. Aracnia was weak, her 
joints stiff, her eyes heavy. Tarantulas could leave her now, and she could 
sleep. Unfortunetly Aracnia knew when he was released that he would cause her 
severe pain and suffering.
    "Alright you insane freak....here you go..." She said sleeply. A small 
cord connecting her core conscience to Tarantulas' core conscience suddenly 
hummed with power as the download began. Slowly she felt her head ease and 
the pain stop.
    With a beep it was done. She ripped the cord out of her head and began to 
back away slowly, with her bowcaster in her hand. She watched as his 
transmetal body began to twitch, his fingers curled. His legs bent and he sat 
up with a graon.
    "Excellent work widow! I feel fantastic. To bad I cant say the same for 
you. Hahahaha!" He said in his raspy voice that sent chills over her.
    Aracnia raised her bowcaster, that felt several hundred pounds, and waved 
it for him to get away. "Dont come any closer! Now that you have your body 
you have to leave, you promised! And I will kill you otherwise."
    Now standing he towered over the female. His giant spider legs shot out 
from his back while his two large arms crossed his chest which heaved with 
every breath. "I lied. Your going to make a place for me in this ship, allow 
me access to all the ships functions, and, from within the shadows, run the 
Predacons."
    "Freak!" She screamed and fired her bowcaster at the Archnid. Her body 
was thrown a bit because she was so exhausted.
    Tarantuals was hit dead on and fell with a smoldering scar on his newly 
constructed body. With a low growl he cursed, got up, and began to thud 
closer to the widow.

    After the useless pursuit, Aerostreak, Adrax, and Autofire entered the 
base where Paralysis, Guantix, and Grappler were. They gathered on the bridge 
where Quickstrike was in command.
    Paralysis saluted Quickstrike and began to spout out the report on the 
assult of the Ark, and how they returned because ammunition was low.
    Suddenly, a small rumble shook the ship. Paralysis looked to Aerostreak 
and then to Quickstrike. He pulled out his wepon and both bots ran towrds the 
sound.
